remarks: Properties which determine the greatest lower bound in a poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)
statement:
posglbd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
posglbd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
posglbd.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( glb ` K ) ) $.
posglbd.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
posglbd.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
posglbd.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. B ) $.
posglbd.lb $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> T .<_ x ) $.
posglbd.gt $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B /\ A. x e. S y .<_ x ) -> y .<_ T ) $.
posglbd $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` S ) = T ) $.
$d .<_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d ph x y $.
